attributes.background: I want the public to come together and remember those that died fighting for our freedom and I suggest that we do this in a similar way to how we honoured the NHS during lockdown by everyone opening their doors at 11:11 on the 11th November and standing in silence together for two minutes

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a matter for individuals.

You might be interested to know that the Government's restrictions allow for  Remembrance Sunday events to take place.  You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/local-authority-preparations-for-remembrance-sunday/local-authority-preparations-for-remembrance-sunday
